name: PIR Subflow [DEPRECATED]
info:
# PIR

This subflow addresses a problem with Zigbee PIR sensors which stay inactive when they detect a constant movement.

## Inputs

Test input to inject PIR message for testing purpose.

## Outputs

### Output I

Motion detected.

### Output II

No motion.

## Parameters

PIR Topic

name: set light payload
info:
# Set Light Payload

This subflow check if it is a night time or day time and sets corresponding light settigs.

## Input
Anything

## Outputs

Payload for light (Ikea bulbs): 
- Output I: night 
- Output II: day
